alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 18 at 7:52PM MDT until July 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Occasional gusts to 60 mph are possible late tonight. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern South Dakota. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
